mapper.insert: insert into boardFRReply (num,frnum,content,replyer,regidate,updatedate) values ((select nvl2(max(num), max(num)+1, 1) from boardfrreply),#{frnum},#{content},#{replyer},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: select num, frnum, content, replyer, regidate,updatedate from boardFRReply where frnum = #{frnum} order by frnum asc
mapper.update: update boardFRReply set content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where num = #{num}
